SEARCH

Class AccountManager

java.lang.Object
AccountManager
public class AccountManager extends Object
This class is responsible for the creation and management of the accounts. This includes depositing, withdrawing and transferring of money.
Author:
ngutt094

      Deposits money into an account given an account number and an amount.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - the account number to deposit the money into
      amount - the amount of money to deposit into the account
      Returns:

      public boolean withdrawl(int accountNumber, int amount)

      Returns:
      true if able to successfully withdraw

    • transfer

      public boolean transfer(int accountNumberSrc, int accountNumberDst, int amount)
      Transfers money in between accounts
      Parameters:
      accountNumberSrc - the account number to withdraw money from
      accountNumberDst - the account number to deposit into
      amount - the amount of money to transfer in between accounts
      Returns:
      true if able to successfully transfer
